actions.name: Absolution
actions.description: Effect: While Gloomy Weather is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50% and the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their Activations. The user is treated as having the Dark Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.

system.description: Effect: While Gloomy Weather is active, the user's SPATK stat is increased by 50% and the user loses a Tick of HP at the end of each of their Activations. The user is treated as having the Dark Type for the effects of Gloomy Weather.
